string-array.name: fullchangelog
string-array.item: @array/v47
@array/v46

string-array.name: v47
string-array.item: version.release.fourtyseven
Create new app that comes with the theme
Touch up CM File Manager\'s Default Colors (To fix black on black, this has to be changed by the user in Color Scheme Options (Click on text color, then press OK without making any changes)
G+ logo and Add Contact Picture in Play Store
Leave Hangout Button Invert

string-array.name: v46
string-array.item: version.release.fourtysix
Attempt to fix Contacts Title Color "Frequently Contacted"
Change Settings Toggle Background Darker
Rewrite Brightness Scrubber as a Vector to respect all resolutions
Fix Play Music Unreadable Text
Retheme Google Play Music with Orange ActionBar
Optimize Trebuchet to attempt to fix Wallpaper FC
Update Google Search Recents Search Bar Background
Keep Account Select Black on Black Fixed
Theme GravityBox Settings
Chrome autofill dropdown dark grey on black background fixed
Whiten Hangout\'s Hangout Name Icon
Increase Hangouts People and Options Windows Readability
Touch Up Gallery3d\'s Style, attempt to fix FC issues due to missing attributes
Fix Dialer FC issues on non-stock DPI, stress tested on 480, 360, 220, 120, 60 DPIs
